description: Leading manufacturer of the iPhone. Dominates the premium smartphone segment.
South Korean conglomerate known for the Galaxy smartphone line.
IDC estimates about 1.2 billion units shipped worldwide, down 5% from 2022.
High-end devices remained stable despite the overall downturn, largely due to Apple's loyal customer base.
More than half of smartphones shipped in 2023 supported 5G networks.
Chinese brand gaining market share in Southeast Asia with competitively priced models.
Manufacturers like Xiaomi and Oppo expanding outside China to capture midrange consumers.
